name: ShakespeareanInsult
0:
”Alexa, ask the bard to insult me”
”Alexa, tell the bard to give me a Shakespearean insult”
”Alexa, tell the bard to insult me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the bard
des: Be insulted in the Shakespearean style. Ask the Bard for an insult, and a random selection from a Shakespeare play or an Elizabethan insult randomly created from the Shakespeare Insult Kit will be hurled your way.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
